- Timing and fuel: schedule when you’re most resilient; have a balanced snack 30–60 minutes before; bring water and a snack for after.
- Bring support: a person you trust or a grounding object (smooth stone, hair tie on wrist) as a reminder to breathe.

  - Please avoid saying numbers out loud.
  - No comments about my body—let’s keep it about the fabric and seams.
